title: Ultimate Medieval Sound Pack
description: There are 1200+ sounds in this bundle, both recorded and designed professionally.
longDescription:
Take a journey back in time with Ultimate Medieval SFX Bundle! With this collection you will have access to Medieval Warfare, Medieval Town, and Green Witch's Cauldron. It covers all your historical needs.


There are 1200+ sounds in this bundle, both recorded and designed professionally. You can find rope stressing sounds, listen to the rain on a beach from a bushes perspective, bottle up potions, and hear a soldier as he gets ready for a battle. Listen to barn animals, horses, weapons and tools; town ambiences, mine, blacksmith, tavern, field, church bells; dried seeds and herbs, defensive spells and transfiguration spells.


Go ahead and check out the contents of the bundles included in Ultimate Medieval SFX Bundle one by one, and start imagining a story already! You'll find yourself first on a brutal battlefield, then come back to the town a little. Donâ€™t be afraid to ask for some healing magic from the Green Witch!


Travel back to the Middle Ages and take Ultimate Medieval SFX Bundle with you!


These sounds are available in 24-bit / 96kHz, recorded delicately with DPA 4060s and Neumann KM184 pair, on a Roland R44 recorder.
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 680

Number of Audio Cues: 680

Sample rate / bit rate: 24 bit - 96 kHz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 1 h 5 min 56 sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://vadisound.com/sound-effect-bundles/ultimate-medieval-sfx-bundle/ , https://youtu.be/-OQFovlEQXk
